articles.description: Manchester City are expected to return to training this week as all Premier League clubs are but the fixture schedule is yet to be worked out
articles.content:
Manchester City could be at an early disadvantage when football resumes as the Premier League makes plans for rearranged games in the schedule.

articles.author: John Aldridge
articles.title: Bill Shankly's famous saying will ring true for returning Liverpool - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Liverpool legend John Aldridge reacts to the news the Reds and other Premier League teams will be returning to training this week after the coronavirus outbreak
articles.content:
I am really pleased to see that Liverpool and the other Premier League teams will be returning to training this week. 
I'm not surprised the clubs voted unanimously to go back as I can imagine many of the players will be chomping at the bit but it was still … [+2564 chars]

articles.title: Manchester United send fans message on season ticket refunds and behind closed doors games - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Man United have sent an email to supporters about season ticket refunds and fixtures due to be played behind closed doors when the Premier League restarts.
articles.content:
Manchester United have confirmed they will refund season ticket holders for the remaining Premier League home matches that are played behind closed doors.
